topics.body: I'm the only one who doesn't give a shit about GTA it seems.

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b598b463687244863a0600#post_54b598b463687244863a0600
[bq="mariomarc"]"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b5938563687232fdc81100#post_54b5938563687232fdc81100
No not cr
Mike michaud is apparently a douchebag and their pr is awful and no one but the people from Chicago get paid for the films


"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b593f563687238559b0b00#post_54b593f563687238559b0b00
Read phelous and obscurus lupas recent tumblr posts[/bq]
So ok i just read BOTH of their posts.

Ok, I really want to talk about this....Fuck Channel Awesome.

Like, SHE WAS LITERALLY CRYING OH MY GOD _*FUCK MIKE*_

And Phelous gave 6 YEARS TO THE SITE AND THEY JUST FUCKED HIM!

*And obscurus lupas was only gone FOR 15 MINUTES AND THEY FIRED HER, WHAT THE SHIT IS THAT?!*

I really dont want to look down on Doug cuz i know e isnt a bad guy (I hope) but, holy shit... What kind of business are they running there?!

Seriously?! Firing your PR Lady RIGHT AFTER she gets out of surgery?!

Now everyone seems to have moved on, well I guess I'm waiting until GTA VI comes around
